EmailTemplate.name: SR Digital Submission
EmailTemplate.subject: Students Rebuild Submission
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for submitting your final numbers to Students Rebuild! We're so grateful you and your team took part in the Students Rebuild Challenge.
We're excited to see your self-portraits arrive in the mail or receive the digital images! Print this email which is your submission slip to include if you're mailing your items to Students Rebuild at:
Students Rebuild
2400 1st Ave South #336
Seattle, WA 98134
Now, it's time to celebrate your team's hard work. A Participation Certificate is available for you to distribute to all your team members on our Challenge Resources page.
Please continue to utilize the learning resources and, if you'd like, create additional self-portraits for submission.
Once the Challenge ends on May 4th, 2018, be on the lookout for a final survey and our Student Impact Report. We'll be sure to email both to you!
Have a question about the Challenge? Find the answer here or email us.
Thanks again,
The Students Rebuild Team
Submission Details {!Contact.Students_Rebuild_Info__c}
